body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Green Motors Customer Support. My name is Benjamin Green. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Grace. Could you please provide me with your car's registration number and the approximate mileage on the odometer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the car's registration number is seven two three four alpha and the odometer reads five six zero zero zero miles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Grace. Can you also confirm the date of the last service appointment and the total cost of the service?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last service was on May twenty third and the total cost was three hundred and fifty dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Grace. I will look into the shipping issue related to your recent service appointment. Your case has been noted and we will follow up with you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Grace. If you have any additional questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us again. Have a great day!
